hero.tagline: Building intelligent automation and scalable systems

about.title: About
about.description: I'm a DevOps and Automation Engineer passionate about building systems that scale. With expertise in CI/CD, containerization, and workflow automation, I help teams ship faster and more reliably. My focus is on creating elegant solutions that reduce complexity and empower developers.
about.automationFirstDesc: Eliminating manual processes through intelligent automation
about.infrastructureDesc: Designing resilient and scalable cloud architectures
about.cicdExpertDesc: Streamlined pipelines for rapid, reliable deployments
about.cloudNativeDesc: Kubernetes, containers, and modern cloud solutions

skills.title: Tech
skills.description: The tools and technologies I use to build robust, scalable automation solutions

workflows.title: n8n
workflows.description: Automated pipelines and integrations I've built to streamline operations
workflows.figmaDesc: AI-powered workflow that transforms Figma designs into fullstack applications
workflows.gitlabDesc: Comprehensive CI/CD automation with SonarQube and Slack notifications
workflows.cloudflareDesc: AI-powered chat assistant for managing Cloudflare DNS records
workflows.devopsDesc: Automated provisioning of Docker, K3s, Jenkins & Grafana stack

projects.title: Featured
projects.description: A selection of automation and infrastructure projects I've built
projects.iacDesc: A complete Terraform-based infrastructure provisioning system with automated compliance checking and cost optimization.
projects.iacLongDesc: Built a comprehensive IaC platform that automates cloud infrastructure provisioning across AWS, GCP, and Azure. Features include automated compliance scanning, cost estimation, and drift detection with real-time notifications.
projects.k8sDesc: Self-healing Kubernetes clusters with automated incident detection and remediation.
projects.k8sLongDesc: Developed an intelligent monitoring solution that detects pod failures, resource exhaustion, and network issues. Automatically applies fixes based on historical patterns and escalates to human operators when needed.
projects.cicdDesc: Unified deployment pipeline supporting multiple cloud providers and deployment strategies.
projects.cicdLongDesc: Created a flexible CI/CD system that supports blue-green, canary, and rolling deployments across different cloud providers. Includes automated rollback capabilities and performance testing gates.
projects.workflowDesc: Centralized n8n-based automation platform connecting 50+ business tools.
projects.workflowLongDesc: Designed and implemented an enterprise automation hub using n8n, integrating CRM, project management, and communication tools. Reduced manual data entry by 80% and improved cross-team visibility.

experience.title: Work
experience.description: My journey in DevOps and automation engineering
experience.seniorDesc: Leading infrastructure automation initiatives and managing cloud-native deployments across multi-region clusters.
experience.devopsDesc: Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time by 70% and improving system reliability.
experience.automationDesc: Built workflow automation solutions using n8n and Python, automating 200+ business processes.
experience.sysadminDesc: Managed Linux infrastructure and initiated the transition to containerized deployments.
